sentences.sContent: That, I believe, is what God asks of us --- not “Be perfect”, not “Don’t even make a mistake”, but “Be whole”.
sentences.sContent_eng: That, I believe, is what God asks of us --- not “Be perfect”, not “Don’t even make a mistake”, but “Be whole”.
sentences.sCn: 我相信这就是上帝对我们的期望：不求“完美”，也不求“从来不犯错误”，而是追求人生的“完整”。

sentences.sContent: Now, you think you can make a mistake on your exam, take a look at this up here at tell me what that all is. I have no idea.
sentences.sContent_eng: Now, you think you can make a mistake on your exam, take a look at this up here at tell me what that all is. I have no idea.
sentences.sCn: 你觉得你可以在考试的时候犯错误，看一看这之前写的东西,能告诉我这些是什么，我也不知道。

sentences.sContent: When you do make a mistake, think about all of the possible solutions, so that when you tell someone, you can suggest ways to fix it.
sentences.sContent_eng: When you do make a mistake, think about all of the possible solutions, so that when you tell someone, you can suggest ways to fix it.
sentences.sCn: 如果真的犯了错误，想一想可能的解决方法，这样你在跟别人说的时候就可以提出解决它的建议。
